C

changeLevelTimer - Variable in class entities.Player
stops the update of the player for the victory screen
checkEnCollision(Collider) - Method in class entities.Collider
called by the entity's method enCollisionManager, checks collision and the side of it, which returns
checkOverlaying(Collider) - Method in class entities.Collider
called by the entity's method enCollisionManager, sets the coordinates of the box's sides and calls a specified method that checks overlapping with the entity which calls the method
checkPlCollision(Collider) - Method in class entities.Collider
called by entity's method plCollisionManager, checks collision and the side of it, which returns, it implements also a sliding feature (between walls) to ease player movement
checkSurroundings(Collider) - Method in class entities.Collider
called by entity's method surroundingsManager, checks if there are other colliders around the one calling it and returns the side in which are found
clip - Variable in class main.Sound
holds the current music file
clipList - Variable in class main.Sound
holds the sound's file ready to play

holds a random value for the password

holds a random value for the password
cod4 - Variable in class backgrounds.GameOver
holds a random value for the password
cod4 - Variable in class backgrounds.Password
holds a random value for the password
Collider - Class in entities
the linked boxes to the entities, the ones being checked for collision, contains also the basic methods of collision checking
Collider(int, int, int, int, int, String, GamePanel) - Constructor for class entities.Collider
used for the borders, explosions and flames, assigns values passed and adds the collider to an array containing all the collider for the specified level
Collider(int, int, int, String, GamePanel) - Constructor for class entities.Collider
used for enemies, soft walls, power ups and bombs, assigns values passed and adds the collider to an array containing all the collider for the specified level
Collider(int, int, int, String, GamePanel, KeyHandler) - Constructor for class entities.Collider
used for the player, assigns values passed
colliders - Variable in class main.GamePanel
holds the colliders for the selected level
colliders1 - Variable in class main.GamePanel
holds the colliders for the selected level
colliders2 - Variable in class main.GamePanel
holds the colliders for the selected level
colliderX - Variable in class entities.Bomb
 
colliderX - Variable in class entities.Flames
 
colliderY - Variable in class entities.Bomb
 
colliderY - Variable in class entities.Flames
 
collisionFinder(BufferedImage, String, int, int, int, int, int) - Method in class backgrounds.Stage
called by constructor, searches the sprite of the map and places collision when found the image passed
collisionManager(Collider) - Method in class entities.Entity
called by the entities in the method update, returns a boolean of impact, it calls enCollisionManager, plCollisionManager or surroundingsManager based on the request
columns - Variable in class main.GamePanel
variable used to set the screen size
compare(Entity, Entity) - Method in class main.DepthComparator
manages the order in which the gamePanel draws the objects, to ensure realistic depth between the entities moving
cont - Variable in class backgrounds.GameOver
image variable
cumulativeTime - Variable in class main.GamePanel
variable used for debug timeOfDrawingCronometer
